title: New Year: Soulmates, Growth & Gratitude
description: Review your relationship's year. Acknowledge the challenges on the front, but flip to celebrate how you overcame them.

cards.content: What was the hardest challenge we faced this year?
cards.back: How did it make us stronger?

cards.content: When did we drift apart?
cards.back: How did we find our way back?

cards.content: What is a misunderstanding we had?
cards.back: What did we learn about communication from it?

cards.content: What is one thing I did that annoyed you?
cards.back: What is one thing I did that delighted you?

cards.content: When were we the most stressed?
cards.back: When were we the most relaxed and happy?

cards.content: What financial goal did we miss?
cards.back: What financial win did we achieve?

cards.content: What is a fear you have for us next year?
cards.back: What is a hope you have for us?

cards.content: When did you feel lonely in the relationship?
cards.back: When did you feel most supported?

cards.content: What is a bad habit we enabled in each other?
cards.back: What is a good habit we built together?

cards.content: Who or what tried to come between us?
cards.back: How did we protect our bond?

cards.content: What was our worst date/outing?
cards.back: What was our absolute best date?

cards.content: When did we fail to listen to each other?
cards.back: When did you feel truly heard?

cards.content: What is a compromise you hated making?
cards.back: Why was it worth it for us?

cards.content: What part of our routine became boring?
cards.back: How can we spice it up next year?

cards.content: When did I let you down?
cards.back: When did I exceed your expectations?

cards.content: What is a secret you kept for too long?
cards.back: Thank you for sharing it now.

cards.content: What argument do we keep having?
cards.back: Let's agree to leave it in the past year.

cards.content: Did we spend too much time on screens?
cards.back: What was our best 'unplugged' moment?

cards.content: What is a trip/plan that got cancelled?
cards.back: What replaced it that was good?

cards.content: When did we take life too seriously?
cards.back: When did we laugh until it hurt?

cards.content: What is something I struggle to accept about you?
cards.back: What do I love most about you?

cards.content: How did we neglect our intimacy?
cards.back: What was the most romantic moment?

cards.content: What external stress impacted us the most?
cards.back: How did we act as a team against it?

cards.content: What is a boundary we crossed?
cards.back: What boundary will we respect next year?

cards.content: Did we lose any friends this year?
cards.back: Who are the people who stuck by us?

cards.content: What is one thing you want less of next year?
cards.back: What is one thing you want more of?

cards.content: When did you feel insecure?
cards.back: When did I make you feel confident?

cards.content: What was a tearful moment?
cards.back: What was a joyful moment?

cards.content: What is something we need to forgive each other for?
cards.back: Seal it with a kiss.

cards.content: What is a goal we gave up on?
cards.back: What is a new dream we are building?

cards.content: How did I fail to support you?
cards.back: How can I be your biggest fan next year?

cards.content: What made you doubt us?
cards.back: What made you choose me again?

cards.content: What felt like a routine chore?
cards.back: What felt like an adventure?

cards.content: What is the hardest thing about loving me?
cards.back: What is the best thing about loving me?

cards.content: Did we lose our spark at any point?
cards.back: How is it burning now?

cards.content: What is a criticism you held back?
cards.back: What is a compliment you hold back?

cards.content: What is a place we hated visiting?
cards.back: What is a place we discovered and loved?

cards.content: When were we selfish?
cards.back: When were we selfless?

cards.content: What worried you most about our future?
cards.back: What excites you most about our future?

cards.content: What is a purchase we regret?
cards.back: What is the best thing we bought together?

cards.content: How did we change for the worse?
cards.back: How did we evolve for the better?

cards.content: What is a text message you regret sending?
cards.back: What is a love note you cherish?

cards.content: Did we take each other for granted?
cards.back: Express gratitude right now.

cards.content: What is one thing you want to leave behind?
cards.back: What is one thing you want to bring forward?

cards.content: Are you happy?
cards.back: How can we make next year even happier?

cards.content: Why was this year hard?
cards.back: Why was this year worth it?

cards.content: What is your promise to me?
cards.back: What is my promise to you?

cards.content: I love you because...
cards.back: Finish the sentence.
